title: Attractive Forces
description: LoganEveryone looks at me and thinks I rule Heath Valley High School. All they see is the captain of the champion rugby team, the guy who has got everything.They don’t see my secret, one I’ll do anything to keep.I’m so used to keeping my sexuality buried I’ve never stopped to think about what it’s costing me.Until I need a chemistry tutor, and Jake Stenton waltzes into my life.JakeBeing new in town is hard, and it’s even harder when it feels like my family is trying to run from a secret in our past.When I’m offered the chance to tutor Logan Madison, I’m nervous about spending time with the most popular guy in school.But Logan turns out to be so different from what I expected, and an unlikely friendship springs up between us. A friendship that’s so different to anything I’ve ever had before and forces me to re-examine everything I thought I knew about myself .But is the attraction between Logan and me more powerful than the external forces trying to rip us apart?
author: Jax Calder
